title: African American support for Dem. party - why

content.prompt: During the 1930s Black voters overwhelmingly switched from the Republican Party to the Democratic Party because

choices.label: Black Americans benefited from some New Deal economic policies
the Ku Klux Klan was gaining power within the Republican Party
southern Democrats widely favored abolishing the poll tax

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
